decision_conditions: The proposed fenestration alterations, by reason of their size, design and position, would represent an incongruous form of development that which will negatively impact the character and appearance of the host property and wider locality. As such, the proposal would be contrary to the NPPF, and the London Borough of Richmond upon Thames Local Plan (2018), in particular Policy LP1, the House Extensions and External Alterations SPD and the London Borough of Richmond upon Thames Local Plan Publication (Regulation 19) Local Plan (2023) Policy 28.
description: Roof extensions to front/side and rear. Additional rooflight to front elevation (Variation of condition 2 of allowed appeal APP/L5810/D/24/3342965 - planning reference 23/2793/HOT - for alterations to fenestration required to facilitate internal layout)
